node.excerpt: 27 May from the Vice-Chancellor to all staff and students Dear Students and Colleagues, As we emerge from another May bank holiday weekend and enter half term we are all acutely conscious that the usual markers do not apply in this time of lockdown. We have gradually realized that this is no short sharp crisis; rather, more than 9 weeks after we closed our buildings, it is clear that emerging from…

frontmatter.title: 27 May from the Vice-Chancellor to all staff and students

node.excerpt: Dear Colleagues and students, It's hard to believe this is Second Week of Trinity Term. The familiar streets are deserted, devoid of posters announcing musical and theatre performances, and students in sub fusc sporting carnations. The work of the University nevertheless continues and I would like to express my appreciation and admiration to those staff and students who have adapted so quickly to…
